metadata.title: CVE-2021-3200 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Buffer overflow vulnerability in libsolv 2020-12-13 via the Solver * testcase_read(Pool *pool, FILE *fp, const char *testcase, Queue *job, char **resultp, int *resultflagsp function at src/testcase.c: line 2334, which could cause a denial of service

criterions.comment: libsolv package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.7.17-1').
